Claim: "Defra spent £12.5 million on an ocean acidification research program between 2009 and 2014."
Implication: "The issue of ocean acidification could have been resolved for next to nothing after a few hours of basic research."

Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists d (IsDefra(a) and WasBetween(c,d))))) -> (exists e (exists f (exists g (IsIssueOfOceanAcidification(e) and (IsNextToNothing(f) and IsBasicResearch(g))))))
